summary: Build a one-page website/landing page for the PhysioTrack app, which asks users about their day, provides a health score, and offers tips.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- PhysioTrack hero illustration featuring a person doing gentle physiotherapy stretches with abstract health/metrics elements (physiotrack-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Minimal, modern app mark/logo symbol (no text), health/physio inspired (physiotrack-mark.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page website (one route) for the PhysioTrack app that clearly explains what the app does: asks users about their day, generates a health score, and provides tips.

Add an interactive “Daily Check-in” section on the same page with a short questionnaire (e.g., sleep, stress, pain/soreness, activity, hydration, mood) and a submit action that calculates and displays a health score (0–100) along with 3–5 actionable tips based on the answers.

Establish a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the one-page site (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across hero, sections, form, and score/tips output. Avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Add generated static image assets for the PhysioTrack one-page site and render them on the page (served from frontend/public/assets/generated).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a one-page website (single-page landing page) for the PhysioTrack app describing its daily check-in, health scoring, and tips features, accessible via a shareable link.
